test_recv_good_bytes_connected()¶

Tests recv() method of SerialArmController with preset byte data as input while it is connected. Uses bad byte data to check for error handling.

test_send_good_bytes_connected()¶

Tests send() method of SerialArmController with preset byte data as input while it is connected. Uses bad byte data to check for error handling.

test_update_position_is_connected()¶

Tests update_position() method of SerialArmController with preset byte data as input while it is connected. Uses bad byte data to check for error handling.
